Label: Study Assay Measurement Type
Description: A term to qualify the endpoint, or what is being measured (e.g. gene expression profiling or protein identification). The term can be free text or from, for example, a controlled vocabulary or an ontology. If the latter source is used the Term Accession Number and Term Source REF fields below are required.

Label: Study Assay Measurement Type Term Accession Number
Description: The accession number from the Term Source associated with the selected term.

Label: Study Assay Measurement Type Term Source REF
Description: The Source REF has to match one of the Term Source Name declared in the Ontology Source Reference section.

Label: Study Assay Technology Type
Description: Term to identify the technology used to perform the measurement, e.g. DNA microarray, mass spectrometry. The term can be free text or from, for example, a controlled vocabulary or an ontology. If the latter source is used the Term Accession Number and Term Source REF fields below are required.

Label: Study Assay Technology Type Term Accession Number
Description: The accession number from the Term Source associated with the selected term.

Label: Study Assay Technology Type Term Source REF
Description: Identifies the controlled vocabulary or ontology that this term comes from. The Source REF has to match one of the Term Source Names declared in the Ontology Source Reference section.

Label: Study Assay Technology Platform
Description: Manufacturer and platform name, e.g. Bruker AVANCE

Label: Study Assay File Name
Description: A field to specify the name of the Assay Table file corresponding the definition of that assay. There can be only one file per cell.
